item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @MisterZ MisterZ
item.description:
@MisterZ wrote:

[code]if (command.startsWith(“yell”) && command.length() > 5) {
if (muted == 1) {
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
}
else {
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+ ": " +command.substring(5);
}

}[/code]

Try that for the yell command.

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @The_Wise_Guy .Kaboom
item.description:
@The_Wise_Guy wrote:

Make it look like

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
}

private final void sendMessage(String message) {
	client.sendMessage(message);
}

private final void addItem(int item, int amount) {
	client.addItem(item, amount);
}

}
}[/code]

Read full topic

Command.java:631: illegal start of expression private final void sendMessage(String message) { ^ 1 error Files Compiled Successfully! Press any key to continue . . .

This is the 3 lines -

[code] if (command.startsWith(“yell”)) {
if(muted == 1)
sendMessage(“You are muted and cannot yell!”);
else
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); }
}

private final void sendMessage(String message) {
	client.sendMessage(message);
}

private final void addItem(int item, int amount) {
	client.addItem(item, amount);
}

}[/code]

See what u can do its starting to **** me off…
